Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: We speculate that this insertion of an L1 sequence in DMD is responsible for some of the population of Japanese patients with XLDCM . .

Let's think step by step.

1. DMD: Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy
2. XLDCM: X-linked Duchenne and Becker Muscular Dystrophies.

So, the entities related to diseases in the paragraph are Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy (DMD) and X-linked Duchenne and Becker Muscular Dystrophies (XLDCM).
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Disease.

1. Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy (DMD)
2. X-linked Duchenne Muscular Dystrophies (XLDCM)

So, the entities related only to diseases in the paragraph are Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy (DMD) and X-linked Duchenne Muscular Dystrophies (XLDCM).

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy (DMD) |
| X-linked Duchenne Muscular Dystrophies (XLDCM) |
